name: Mojito
description: Step into a Caribbean oasis with this traditional Cuban cocktail. The Mojito combines white rum's smoothness with the vibrant acidity of lime juice and the refreshing coolness of mint, all balanced by a touch of sweetness from cane sugar.
instructions: Drop lime wedges, mint leaves and simple syrup into base of glass. Muddle well.
Add ice and rum before topping with club soda.
Garnish with a lime wedge and a mint sprig.
